description:
Kyoko has expressed interest in taking on a role in the big hit drama remake of "Tsukigomori" called "Dark Moon".   Meanwhile, Ren has received opposition towards going for a role in the very same movie from Lori, citing Ren`s weak point in his ability to perform.  As things progress, Kyoko discovers that remaking this movie to the standards of the first movie, is much more difficult than she expected...
Source: crunchyroll
